price: Efrisε, sε Wogyae wͻn a, wͻbεyera Wo nkoa no; na abͻnefoͻ boniayεfoͻ nko ara na wͻbεwo wͻn.
arabic: إِنَّكَ إِن تَذَرۡهُمۡ يُضِلُّواْ عِبَادَكَ وَلَا يَلِدُوٓاْ إِلَّا فَاجِرٗا كَفَّارٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: innaka in tadharhum yuḍillū ʿibādaka walā yalidū illā fājiran kaffāran
